greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Interleave 1,2,3,.. with 1,1,2,2,3,3,...
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1,0,1,0,-1).
formula: a(n) = 0^n + Sum_{k=0..n-1} (if(k=floor((n-1)/2) or k=floor(n/2),1,0)*floor((k+2)/2)). - _Paul Barry_, Nov 22 2009
Also, a(n) = ((3 + (-1)^n)*(n+2) - i*(i^n - (-i)^n))/8, where i is the imaginary unit. - _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 22 2010
results.author: _Paul Barry_, May 03 2005
